segments.text: yes , my brothe and I are going . We just finished making our itinerary .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that's really cool ! I've always dreamed of going somewhere like Tibet , seeing something unique .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: great minds think alike . My brother and I have been thinking about going to Tibet for quite a long time . Do you have anything on your schedule ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: why don't you join us ? We are leaving next week ; you'll still have a week to prepare .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: oh , Tibet sounds great , but I'm afraid it'll cost too much . Last time I traveled to India , and it cost me a fortune .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: come on ! We're traveling on our own . It won't cost too much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ok , then count me in . where will we stay ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: the youth hotels are comfortable and cheap .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: then make sure that you book me a room , too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: and check whether they accept credit cards .
segments.speaker: S1
